note: Former journalist, photographer and social media pioneer (really!) At GeoCities, he helped build what we now call social media. Five-time Ignited Fellow, working at Lockheed Martin on classified military communications satellites, at Meta (Facebook,) exploring global supply chain issues, at Palo Alto Networks working on cybersecurity, and Amazon. The views on this site are my own and do not necessarily represent the views, opinions, vision, or strategies of the Cupertino Union School District.

name: Tales From CREATE
